Text: Thanks, I hope this very serious thought disorder can be resolved, that people will learn the difference between fantasy and reality, that they will base beliefs on logical deductions originating from facts and be ready to always reevaluate these positions and that they will be able to deal with ignorance, that they will not be seduced by wishful thinking or romantic music, etc. I am deeply disgusted by religion. This mental poison, this pretended knowledge, is the biggest plague humanity ever faced.
Thank you, very good quality and a really good series

אַ שײנעם דאַנק

A sheynem dank!

Thanks Eddie your a hero. 
1st rate erudite polemic should be required watching for anyone proffessing any kind of religion, quite fun to watch as well. Does not argue against the existence of a creator rather the fantasy of 'beliefs' that surround the idea of one. Another antidote to 'fuckwit TV'.
